WorkItem.Description:
I have implemented a new column type (inherited from DataGridTextColumn). The new column overrides the GenerateElement method and uses the "object dataItem" parameter of this method.
 
The "dataItem" returns wrong values when the user starts to scroll in the DataGrid. 
 
To reproduce this bug extract the DataGridDemo.zip file and open the solution. Run the application and scroll down in the DataGrid (it doesn't matter how you scroll down: Cursor down, Page down or scroll bar).
The left column is the one which displays the "dataItem" and the right column shows the same value with the DataGridTextColumn. Note: The values in the left column are wrong whereas the values in the right one are correct.

Result:
Hugo 26   |   Hugo 26
Hugo 0     |   Hugo 27
Hugo 28   |   Hugo 28
WorkItem.Summary: The dataItem parameter of GenerateElement is wrong
